column5: What ever happened to are good buddy shawn?I haven't seen a post in months.
I know where he is... lol  Send me a PM.
Funny you should ask i talked to him today and he say's he is doing good Hey Dan   Shawn said he will give you a call he's just getting his boat ready for the season
Rob... get back to work... you missed enough of the shift already standing out in the parking lot from 1 to 2 ... LOL
What that was my lunch hour lol
Rob are you getting ready for some spring salmon?Get Shawn to bring you down to my place and I will take you guys out for the tour. Dan
Sounds good to me Shawn is coming by my place Monday i will send you a PM  Rob
I talked to Shawn a week or so ago and he was saying that he didn't have access to the internet currently.
